name: PivotItem
description: Represents an item in a PivotTable field.

properties.name: drilledDown
properties.description: True┬áif the flag for the specified PivotTable field or PivotTable item is set to drilled (expanded, or visible).

properties.name: calculated
properties.description: True┬áif the PivotTable item is a calculated field or item.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Returns or sets a┬áString┬ávalue representing the name of the object.

properties.name: pivotField
properties.description: Returns the parent Pivot Field for the current PivotItem.

properties.name: position
properties.description: Returns or sets a┬áLong┬ávalue that represents the position of the item in its field, if the item is currently showing.

properties.name: recordCount
properties.description: Returns the number of records in the PivotTable cache or the number of cache records that contain the specified item.

properties.name: showDetail
properties.description: True┬áif the outline is expanded for the specified range (so that the detail of the column or row is visible). The specified range must be a single summary column or row in an outline. For the┬áPivotItem┬áobject (or the┬áRange┬áobject if the range is in a PivotTable report), this property is set to┬áTrue┬áif the item is showing detail.

properties.name: sourceName
properties.description: Returns a value that represents the specified objectΓÇÖs name, as it appears in the original source data, for the specified PivotTable report.

properties.name: visible
properties.description: Returns or sets a┬áBoolean┬ávalue that determines whether the object is visible.

methods.name: getDataRange
methods.description: Returns a┬áRange┬áobject that represents the range of the current PivotItem.
